response.overview: Journey into the depths of an abandoned children's insane asylum. Scale a barbed wire fence to gain access into a historic power station. Take cover behind a crumbing pillar as security patrols outside an open window. Enter at your own risk. Travel along with a subculture of modern day adventurers, known as urban explorers, as they enter dilapidated, historic buildings left behind by society. "Life in Decay" follows urban explorers, preservationists, and owners while they investigate the complicated history and unknown future of these forbidden relics of the past.
response.tagline: Defying boundaries and risking arrest, modern day adventurers known as 'urban explorers' uncover the haunting beauty and hidden stories of abandoned structures, igniting a debate about preservation and the allure of the forbidden.
response.title: Life in Decay

results.name: Life in Decay Movie | Urban Exploration (Urbex)  Documentary and Preservation
